name: Sea Plane 3D Flight Sim
description:
Welcome to Sea Plane 3D Flight Sim, your mobile flight simulator! Get ready to jump into your very own amphibious sea plane and go on a tour of a vast and gorgeous landscape. Chase down birds, explore an airship, and fly though wind turbines(if you can make it). Don't forget to land at the dock to refuel! Featuring music by http://MatthewPablo.com

Offers both joystick and tilt controls with adjustable sensitivity. Realistic flight simulation that's 100% FREE!

HOW TO PLAY:

Use the on screen joystick, or tilt controls, to control the aircraft. On screen buttons can be tapped to control throttle, gear, brake, camera, and camera reset. You can reset your airplane in the pause menu. If you run out of fuel, glide in and land near a dock to refuel.

FEATURES:

*Realistic flight simulator for mobile!

*Working controls, flaps, and surfaces!

*4 Cameras to choose from(cockpit, orbit, tower, chase).

*An unbelievable landscape to explore
